product.title: Unbranded Upgraded Automatic Rotating Curling Iron -  CurlPro Plus Long Barrel Curling Wand for Long Hair, Ceramic Hair Curler for Women, Anti-Scald, Tangle-Free, 600M Ionic, Dual Voltage, Gold, 1 Inch
product.title_excluding_brand: Upgraded Automatic Rotating Curling Iron -  CurlPro Plus Long Barrel Curling Wand for Long Hair, Ceramic Hair Curler for Women, Anti-Scald, Tangle-Free, 600M Ionic, Dual Voltage, Gold, 1 Inch
product.description: Easy Curls, No Skill Needed: CURLPRO PLUS automatic curling iron curls hair with just a press of a button. Built-in timer signals when your curl is ready, making it effortless to create perfect curls—even for beginners.
product.description_html: Easy Curls, No Skill Needed:  CURLPRO PLUS automatic curling iron curls hair with just a press of a button. Built-in timer signals when your curl is ready, making it effortless to create perfect curls—even for beginners.
product.description_full:
Easy Curls, No Skill Needed: CURLPRO PLUS automatic curling iron curls hair with just a press of a button. Built-in timer signals when your curl is ready, making it effortless to create perfect curls—even for beginners. * Longer Barrel for Longer Hair: The long barrel curling iron is specifically designed for long or thick hair, creating smooth, consistent curls from shoulder-length to waist-length with every pass.
   Faster Styling with Dual Heaters: Long hair can take forever to style, but patented dual PTC heating speeds up styling, delivering even heat for flawless curls in less time—perfect for busy mornings or quick touch-ups.
   
 * Bouncy Curls, 72-Hour Hold: Whether your hair is thick or thin, the rotating curling iron with a floating plate adapts to all hair types, creating better-defined curls that last up to 72 hours. No more worrying about your long locks falling flat.
   
 * 
   Sleek Results, Safe Use: The auto hair curler features 360° anti-scald design and anti-tangle technology to ensure safe, smooth styling. 600 million negative ions and T-GLOSS tourmaline ceramic coating leave you with shiny, beachy waves.
product.description_full_html:
Easy Curls, No Skill Needed: CURLPRO PLUS automatic curling iron curls hair with just a press of a button. Built-in timer signals when your curl is ready, making it effortless to create perfect curls—even for beginners.
  • Longer Barrel for Longer Hair: The long barrel curling iron is specifically designed for long or thick hair, creating smooth, consistent curls from shoulder-length to waist-length with every pass.
    Faster Styling with Dual Heaters: Long hair can take forever to style, but  patented dual PTC heating speeds up styling, delivering even heat for flawless curls in less time—perfect for busy mornings or quick touch-ups.
     
  • Bouncy Curls, 72-Hour Hold: Whether your hair is thick or thin, the rotating curling iron with a floating plate adapts to all hair types, creating better-defined curls that last up to 72 hours. No more worrying about your long locks falling flat.
     

  • Sleek Results, Safe Use: The auto hair curler features 360° anti-scald design and anti-tangle technology to ensure safe, smooth styling. 600 million negative ions and T-GLOSS tourmaline ceramic coating leave you with shiny, beachy waves.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
